1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Singleton content type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Singleton
6  ( -- * Type
7    CTypeOf (..),
8    getAbAb,
9  
10    -- * Empty and End
11    CEmpty (..), maybeEmpty, omitEmpty,
12    CEnd (..),
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture             as O
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                 as B
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type            as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Message as Msg
19
20
21-- --------------------------------------------  Type
22
23class CTypeOf c where
24    typeOf :: c -> D.Type
25
26getAbAb :: (CTypeOf c) => (c -> Bool) -> (c -> b) -> B.Ab c -> B.Ab b
27getAbAb _ _    (Left a) = Left a
28getAbAb is get (Right c)
29    | is c      = Right $ get c
30    | otherwise = let s = B.mixToFlatString $ B.mixEncode $ typeOf c
31                  in Msg.unmatchType s
32
33
34-- --------------------------------------------  Empty and End
35
36-- | Empty: the minimum content.
37class (CTypeOf c) => CEmpty c where
38    isEmpty     :: c -> Bool
39    empty       :: c
40
41maybeEmpty :: (CEmpty c) => (a -> c) -> Maybe a -> c
42maybeEmpty f (Just a)   = f a
43maybeEmpty _ (Nothing)  = empty
44
45omitEmpty :: (CEmpty c) => O.Map [(a, c)]
46omitEmpty = B.omit (isEmpty . snd)
47
48-- | End of everything: the maximum content.
49class (CTypeOf c) => CEnd c where
50    isEnd       :: c -> Bool
51    end         :: c
52
